WSUS31 KKCI 232055 
SIGE

FROM 40SSE HTO-60S ACK-150SE SIE-60ESE SBY-50ESE CYN-40SSE HTO 
AREA TS MOV FROM 22040KT. TOPS TO FL320.

VALID UNTIL 2255Z 
NC SC GA CSTL WTRS 
FROM 130SE ILM-160SSE ILM-130SSE CHS-80SSE CHS-100S ILM-130SE ILM 
AREA TS MOV FROM 22030KT. TOPS TO FL350. 
 
OUTLOOK VALID 232255-240255 
AREA 1...FROM RDU-CHS-AMG-CEW-VUZ-CLT-RDU 
WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS. 
 
AREA 2...FROM BGR-200SE ACK-180ESE SIE-50E SLT-MPV-BGR 
WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS.
